title: @Meddler regarding Kindred
body:
For 7.5. Would you consider giving Kindred these buffs?


+3 base armor.

200 additional radius to W ((It's 200 range bigger around. I don't know the exact word for it.))

+1% max health damage on Mounting Dread

attack speed increased from .625 to .645

Mounting Dread slow increased to 1.5 second from 1. 


?

I think these would put Kindred in a comfortable, more tolerable spot without breaking her. The only players who'd actually be able to utilize these buffs to a noticeable difference are the OTPS, and in the end they still will have a lower winrate than other jungle mains anyways, but it'll definitely feel a lot less depressing to play with these minute changes. 

I hope you consider it please.

replies.body: As for whoever downvoted me, I'd really be interested in seeing your Kindred ranking, or actual rank in general and why you think these would be bad buffs.

i didn't see a single player playing that cancer since a few months and i have no problem if it stays like that.

apart from the fact that no buffs are needed for that champ in the first place.

I'm not a Kindred player at all, but the champion has been at around 47% winrate and 1.8% pickrate for 9 patches straight. At which point do you think buffs are needed? A champion not needing buffs and you personally not wanting a champion to get buffs are two different things.
